Text:
Can anyone tell me where to start reading?
I made some researches and I'm also watching the fist season of the tv show.I could not watch much of it it as it was originally aired and I'm trying to do it now.Any pieces of advice will be very welcome.Thanks everyone.
you should star with the original dark horse run, then read all the miniseries and the one shots released before season 8,then watch the show and read season 8 and season 9
if u want season 1, i could upload it, i have it in decent resolution. FLV format

Rummy, you are truly awesome!

Any chance of getting the oversized hardcover trade Buffy The Vampire Slayer: Tales by Tim Sale? I can't find it anywhere.
ok..i'll keep my eye out for that
